participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and easygoing, she enjoys the simple pleasures of life.
participant_1.background: i like to take walks. i don't drink soda. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and hardworking, he finds joy in nature and music.
participant_2.background: i have three arabian horses. i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to ride horses. i like to listen to rock music while working.
